title: 80/831/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 August 1980 finding that the apparatus described as 'Lexington-Lex-02-Con Analyser with starter kit' is not a scientific apparatus
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 1 August 1980  finding that the apparatus described as "Lexington-Lex-02-Con Analyser with starter kit" is not a scientific apparatus  (80/831/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Lexington-Lex-02-Con Analyser with starter kit" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
